ResearchProjectDef.label: basic beegirls
ResearchProjectDef.description: The basic knowledge of Bee Girls. Gives information as to how their hives work and opens the door to future research.

ResearchProjectDef.label: industrial beegirls
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research to bring the bee race into the industrial age. This involves the creation of a large scrap machine powered by radiation. Sure this machine could easily be made by humans but through bee ingenuity they have invented a new resource by covering uranium in honey exemplifying its radiative and mutational properties.

ResearchProjectDef.label: robo beegirls
ResearchProjectDef.description: A robot designed around the biology of bee girls and given all the knowledge and learning power of an AI persona core. It must be powered by a core of radioactive honey covered uranium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tier 1 stingers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into the structure of a stinger. Gives insight of the creation of simple steel replacements.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tier 2 stingers
ResearchProjectDef.description: The use of radiation applied to different bee species allowing the creation of unique and powerful stingers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tier 3 stingers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using radiation on the strongest types of bees known to man to extract the strongest stingers of all.

ResearchProjectDef.label: simple beeonics
ResearchProjectDef.description: The first step into mutating bee parts into organs usable by people.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced beeonics
ResearchProjectDef.description: A further push of research into how bee species with organs and limbs specialised into certain skills can be applied to humanoid creatures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bee delivery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Teach a hive of bees to deliver mail and packages to factions and traders. It can be considered as a neolithic comms console.

ResearchProjectDef.label: honey-turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: A modified mini-turrer which shoots sticky honey stunning a target.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hive temperature regulation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Provide insight into the way bees regulate temperatures in their hives and use this knowledge to alter the temperatures of your hive.

ResearchProjectDef.label: specialised hive temperatures
ResearchProjectDef.description: With different species of bees living in hotter or colder climates they are able to bring about more extreme temperatures simulating their home climates.

ResearchProjectDef.label: beepowder usage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Beepowder is a special more volatile form of gunpowder made by bees. With research this powder can be used to make powdered weapons which are able to do 3x the damage of its original power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: insect hive
ResearchProjectDef.description: With the discovery of an insectoid bee queen a relationship between it and insects on the rim have been observed. With further research an allied insect hive can be created, managed by insectoid bees.
